product_name: Fizik Arione Wing Flex Saddle - Men's
long_description: Meeting the demands of serious cyclists, Arione Wing Flex saddle from Fizik combines ultralight components with performance features. Wing Flex(TM) design employs a flexible carbon fiber shell on the rear edges of the saddle. These edges flex downward with the rider during the power stroke, increasing comfort and promoting an efficient sitting position. K:ium alloy rails are lighter and stronger that titanium. Microtex cover breathes well, absorbs little water, dries quickly and requires no maintenance. Fizik Seat Bag (sold separately) attaches via a unique, easy-to-use, integrated clip system.
short_description: Meeting the demands of serious cyclists, Arione Wing Flex saddle from Fizik combines ultralight components with performance features.
